dialogue.text: Oh my, Cy, the Mechanical Eye!
When are you gonna play an [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]UNPLUGGED[/wave] set for us? HA!
Ah, robot jokes. You must be running out of material.
Jeez, its like you can [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]SEE[/wave] right through me!
Who's the shifty eyed ball of angst next to you?
Couldn't sneak a hobbit past you. Eh, Sauron?
